endpoint

Class MessageEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • endpoint.MessageEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.websocket.Encoder, javax.websocket.Encoder.Text<ChatMessage>

    public class MessageEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.websocket.Encoder.Text<ChatMessage>
    This class handles the outgoing message from the MyServerEndpoint Class. In fact, it ENCODES the messages from a "ChatMessage" istance to an outgoing JSON string. Be aware: this decoder is similar to the client correspective.
    Author:
    Stefano Belli
